name: Gamla Stan (Old Town)
description: The historic heart of Stockholm, known for its cobblestone streets, colorful buildings, and the Royal Palace.

name: Vasa Museum
description: A maritime museum displaying the only almost fully intact 17th-century ship that has ever been salvaged, the 64-gun warship Vasa.

name: Djurgården Park
description: A lush island park featuring museums, gardens, and the Skansen open-air museum and zoo.

name: ABBA The Museum
description: An interactive exhibition about the pop group ABBA, their music, and their legacy.

name: Stockholm City Hall
description: Famous for its grand ceremonial halls and unique architecture, and the venue of the Nobel Prize banquet.

name: Fotografiska Museum
description: A contemporary photography museum with rotating exhibitions and a popular café with city views.

name: Sergels Torg
description: A central public square in Stockholm, known for its modernist glass obelisk and vibrant city life.

name: Skansen Museum
description: The world's first open-air museum, showcasing Swedish history with historic buildings and a zoo.
